newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - SPSS rating, estimate upped.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - SPSS rating, estimate upped.

text.p: -- EVEREN Securities Inc said Monday it raised its rating and estimates for SPSS Inc. The statistical software company's intermediate-term rating is now outperformer, compared to market performer, and its six-month price target is $35, up from $30. Its 18-month price target is $41, up from $35.
-- EVEREN's fiscal 1997 earnings estimate was raised to $1.48 from $1.42 to reflect improving internal growth and the expected contribution from recent acquisitions.
-- EVEREN said SPSS is also positioned to drive productivity and enhance data usage in commercial, academic and governmental institutions.
-- The company's stock was up 7/8 Monday at 27-7/8.
